attributes.title: Bad
attributes.userName: A person that you should trust

attributes.title: crashing
attributes.review: it took forever to download, then when i opened it it kept crashing my phone. no matter how many times i powered off my phone, where time i would go into the app it would crash. i’m getting very tired of it.

attributes.title: 2 thumbs down
attributes.review: If only they had a 0 star rating. No use for this app at all.

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: Not gonna lie, downloaded the app and it crashed my phone. Just wanted to see the plans of the Oompa Loompa. But I guess it wasn’t meant to be.

attributes.title: Bloop
attributes.review: This app killed my phone. It made it impossible for me to open my social media apps and the colors were 🤮

attributes.title: delete this app
attributes.review: hello i spend most of my days on tik tok not gonna lie. now when mr trump decided to announce taking it down i changed my location to canada. but i’ve now been told it won’t do anything so here i am writing this review to prevent my favorite most scrumptious app from being deleted 🥰🤮🍆💕🍌

attributes.title: Awful app
attributes.review: I tried to work this app to support trump, but it kept glitching out and I got a ton of spam mail.

attributes.title: saving tik tok
attributes.review: this app is a piece of sh*t. took about a week to download and once is did it took up about 50% of my storage causing me to loose over 500 pictures and videos from my camera roll. i would never recommend this for anyone in the right mind

attributes.title: this app is horrifying
attributes.review: i downloaded this app because i heard about through a family member and when i opened up i had scariest most horrible experience. first of all my little sister was right next to me and saw the image of a man with concerning amount of orange in his skin and how she’s scarred.

attributes.title: Just no 😌
attributes.review: I opened this app with hopes of seeing something worthwhile, and now i’m never opening it again 🥰💫🧚🏻‍♀️
